Every classically decorated room at Iris Hotel includes carpeted floors and a desk. A hairdryer is provided in the bathrooms.

A breakfast buffet is served in the on-site café, and several dining options can be found within a 10-minute walk of the hotel.

Aleksandrovs central square, Sovetskaya Ploshchad, is 2 km from Iris Hotel, and Aleksandrov Train Station is 5 minutes drive away, providing access to Moscow city.
